entry.title: Better Together: Unleashing the Synergy of Pandas, Polars, and Apache Arrow
entry.summary:
Description

Supercharge your data engineering workflows by merging the robustness of Pandas with the high-speed capabilities of Polars, all underpinned by Apache Arrow's in-memory technology. This technical deep-dive will unravel the nuances between Pandas and Polars, showcase their newest features, and demonstrate how to integrate them for optimal performance. Learn â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Supercharge your data engineering workflows by merging the robustness of Pandas with the high-speed capabilities of Polars, all underpinned by Apache Arrow's in-memory technology. This technical deep-dive will unravel the nuances between Pandas and Polars, showcase their newest features, and demonstrate how to integrate them for optimal performance. Learn actionable techniques to make your data pipelines faster, more efficient, and ready for scale. Join us to see how you might elevate your data engineering toolkit!

entry.title: Welcome to PyBay 2024!
entry.content:
Description

Welcome and kickoff session for the PyBay 2024 Conference in San Francisco, CA on 21 Oct 2024.

entry.title: Wrap Up PyBay 2024
entry.content:
Description

Wrap Up and Thank You for PyBay 2024.

Join us to celebrate our gathering, thank everyone who made it possible and get a glimpse of our next event.

entry.title: Closing Remarks
entry.content:
Description

Join us to wrap up the PyBay 2025 Conference, hear about the day and important messages from a few guest speakers.

entry.title: Welcome & Opening Remarks
entry.content:
Description

Join us to kick off PyBay 2025 with Chris Brousseau the Conference Chair. Hear about the day and important messages from a few guest speakers.
